instruction: Identify and explain two scientific theories from the given list.
output:
Cell theory is the scientific theory which states that all living organisms are composed of cells. It was first proposed by German physicians and biologists in the 19th century.

The heliocentric theory is a scientific theory which states that the Sun is at the center of the solar system. It was first proposed by Polish astronomer Nicolaus Copernicus in the 16th century.
